name: The Twilight Bane
description:
The Twilight Curse will inevitably turn you to dust. Use all your alchemy skills, to find a series of potions to delay the poison until morning. 

Click and Drag 2 Ingredients  into the Cauldron to mix. (no matches allowed) 

Got an Ingredient you want to save? Drag it to the side for safe keeping. 

Press Space to open a cookbook of effective potions.

Potions have various strengths to recover more health, making them more valuable than others.
